title: PrepareRunConfig
description: Represents the configuration for preparing a run.

array_name.title: Array Name
array_name.description: The name of the array to use.

start_dt.title: Start Dt
start_dt.description: The start datetime of the run.

alt_deg.title: Alt Deg
alt_deg.description: The altitude of the pointing direction in degrees, measured from horizon to zenith.

az_deg.title: Az Deg
az_deg.description: The azimuth of the pointing direction in degrees measured East from North.

num_bright_sources.title: Num Bright Sources
num_bright_sources.description: The number of bright sources to use in the simulation, if any.

spacing_deg.title: Spacing Deg
spacing_deg.description: The spacing between bright sources in degrees

faint_sky_model_fits.title: Faint Sky Model Fits
faint_sky_model_fits.description: The path to the faint sky model fits file, if given.

start_freq_hz.title: Start Freq Hz
start_freq_hz.description: The start frequency of the simulation in Hz.

channel_width_hz.title: Channel Width Hz
channel_width_hz.description: The channel width of the simulation in Hz.

num_channels.title: Num Channels
num_channels.description: The number of channels in the simulation.

num_times.title: Num Times
num_times.description: The number of times in the simulation.

integration_time_s.title: Integration Time S
integration_time_s.description: The integration time of the simulation in seconds.

calibration_parset.title: Calibration Parset
calibration_parset.description: The path to the calibration parset.

a_term_parset.title: A Term Parset
a_term_parset.description: The path to the a-term parset.

RFISimConfig.title: RFISimConfig
RFISimConfig.description: A pydantic BaseModel that can be serialised and deserialised using pickle, working well with Ray.

lte_east.title: Lte East
lte_east.desciption: Distance east of RFI transmitter from center of the telescope [m].

lte_north.title: Lte North
lte_north.description: Distance south of RFI transmitter from center of the telescope [m].

lte_up.title: Lte Up
lte_up.description: Height of RFI transmitter [m] above array centre.

lte_polarization_deg.title: Lte Polarization Deg
lte_polarization_deg.description: Polarization angle of RFI [deg, 0=full XX, 90=full YY].

lte_power_W_Hz.title: Lte Power W Hz
lte_power_W_Hz.description: Power of RFI transmitter at the source [W/Hz].
